Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We analyzed genotype / phenotype correlations , on the basis of the constitution of a WT1 mutation database of 84 germ - line mutations , to compare the distribution and type of mutations , according to the different symptoms .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| WT1 mutation |

Explanation:

The only disease-related entity mentioned in the paragraph is the "WT1 mutation." It is a genetic mutation that can cause various symptoms and is the focus of the analysis being described.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| WT1 mutation |

Explanation:

The only disease-related entity mentioned in the paragraph is the "WT1 mutation." Although it is a genetic mutation, it is being analyzed in the context of its different symptoms, which implies that it is being studied as a disease entity. Therefore, it is the only valid entity to be included in the table.
